name: Digital Therapeutics Partnership
goal:
The Digital Therapeutics Partnership (DTP) brings together a unique alliance that covers the full spectrum of digital healthcare – including global companies, startups, healthcare institutions, academic research consortia and patient groups.

Our mission is to help create the healthcare of tomorrow through the transformational power of digital technologies with the view to improving people’s lives, enhancing health outcomes, and increasing efficiencies in healthcare systems.

To do so we aim at partnering with all relevant actors including public institutions and decision-makers to build an enabling policy environment for digital healthcare that will allow solutions and technologies to be developed, deployed, grown in Europe, and ultimately benefit patients and citizens.
euInitiatives: We share innovative case studies in a wide range of fields across the digital health spectrum and entrepreneurial perspectives, to inform of the challenges and actively remove barriers faced by our partners on a day-to-day basis, in terms of policies and regulations and help change these into opportunities.
